text:
Game. Plane at the price of odnushki in Kaluga
06 Nov 2019, 11:37 by Nikolai Maslov
AliExpress is a wonderland, it entered here - it disappeared for a century. But how else, when in the vastness of this online platform you can find everything, even the most unexpected things?
Do you think the set is limited to gadgets and all kinds of consumer goods? Nothing like this! Here you can even buy a plane. And not just any toy, but quite real.
Even from the future, perhaps. Meet: a huge universal drone with a hydrogen propulsion Eagle + VTOL.
For reliable purchases, we use the Letyshops extension: it calculates scams, finds the lowest prices and returns a cashback. 1. Install the Letyshops extension for your browser. 2. We register on the site and enter the account. 3. We go to the page of the selected product. All ...
Composite future design



Surprisingly, the Chinese seller of aircraft models and components among the rather familiar, in general, for the modelers of goods offers a real plane. Otherwise, to call Eagle + VTOL the language does not rotate.
Eagle + VTOL: 2-meter two-beam drone with a wingspan of 3.5 meters with the aerodynamics of the aircraft (designed for classic horizontal flight). Inspires?
The design consists of 4 semi-independent elements, such as the famous P-38 Lightning (on which Saint-Exupery flew) or the Fw.189, known to us under the nickname "Rama":

bearing beams-nacelles,
cargo compartment fuselage,
large elongation wing
horizontal plumage with a trapezoidal profile.

From the point of view of modern aerodynamics - an excellent design. From the point of view of an aircraft modeller and an aircraft engineer, it‚Äôs an extremely successful layout that is impossible to think of from a finger.
To reduce weight, they abandoned the metal, completely manufacturing a drone from industrial fiberglass (honeycomb composite). It turned out only 10 kg of empty weight with a total weight of up to 20 kg.
Battery to choose from



Classic quad, hex and other multi-copters suffer from the problem of flight stabilization and have a fixed ratio ‚Äúflight weight / flight duration‚Äù.
It is almost impossible to go beyond the hour on electric traction. Usually - no more than half an hour if the drone carries the load. Hydrogen fuel cells increase flight duration up to 2 hours.
Batteries are cheaper and more affordable; hydrogen elements are dangerous, but give more traction and flight time. Eagle + VTOL does not make you choose: it can fly on both.
The battery compartment and the glider itself are designed for a LiPo 12s, 10000 mAh battery. It is also possible to use a hydrogen element 9L / 500W. The total mass of "fuel" should not exceed 8.5 kilograms.
Vertical take-off and push propeller combo



The developers used a combined scheme: 4 propellers on the beams are used for vertical take-off and landing, the pushing screw on the fuselage works as the main one, creating flight thrust.
Thus, the drone starts from sites only 5 √ó 5 meters.
However, only 1 motor is used. According to the developer, its total power is 500 kW (?).
What does it give? After vertical take-off, additional propellers can be used to stabilize the airframe in difficult flight conditions, or shut off.
Then the propeller turns the drone into a regular radio-controlled aircraft that can fly for a very long time.
Features from the future



The estimated time when using these elements is at least 5 hours in a horizontal plane without additional screws. Not bad?
The maximum speed for which Eagle + VTOL is designed is 115 km / h (32 m / s). Constant, the so-called "cruising" speed - 100 km / h (28 m / s).
However, there are also drawbacks: landing speed when trying to land "on an airplane" should be at least 86 km / h (24 m / s), otherwise the engine will simply crash down. With a full load, this operation is difficult for such giants.
The most versatile brains
With management, everything is not too clear. The seller makes it clear that the flight control system can work with computers. In this case, the operating system does not matter.
But what exactly is inside is a secret. The versatility speaks in favor of the ArduCopter, which is very beloved by Chinese companies, a variant of the Arduino ARM microcontroller, specially designed for radio-controlled unmanned systems.
First of all, for drones requiring a complex flight correction system.
Purchase, import and other difficulties



The seller offers for direct sale only an airframe. Engine, fuel cell, screws and electronics not included.
A quick search of the store gives you certain options that you need to consider yourself.
The seller himself claims that when buying, he will not only tell you what to collect from, but also offer a ready-made version (and hints that he will be included). Why can‚Äôt you tell before transferring money? Who knows.
This drone is subject to simplified registration. Like a quadrocopter, and not like a full-fledged aircraft. But there is no escaping customs duty.
And it will be tangible of the full cost. Eagle + VTOL costs as much as as much as 1,300,000 rubles, or one million three hundred thousand rubles.



Cashback 84,400 rubles. Enough on a MacBook.
However, for those who may require a similar unit, the amount is small. This is a real plane: 5 hours of flight, 10 kilograms of payload.
If you want, spray the fields, if you want, shoot the video, if you want, conduct reconnaissance. Just remember to register and get permission to fly.
